Jackson’s supporters praised his earthy speech as evidence of his common touch, while his (i) _________ condemned it as (ii) _________.
Blank (i)
Blank (ii)
(A) interlocutors
(D) vulgar
(B) detractors
(E) obtuse
(C)  contemporaries
(F) genteel
